item.title: Katamari Damacy 2 screenshots
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Katamari Damacy 2 screenshots from the Namco site... (Link courtesy of BoingBoing) I just beat Katamari Damacy this weekend, and if you haven't checked out this game yet do it now. It friggen rocks.
item.excerpt:encoded: Katamari Damacy 2 screenshots from the Namco site... (Link courtesy of BoingBoing) I just beat Katamari Damacy this weekend, and if you haven't checked out this game yet do it now. It friggen rocks.
